name: Satu warna V.2
description:
How to play this game? 

And what thing that make this game so Hard? 

To play this game, you must Collect 5 orb to Win this game, but the map is quite big than the first one, and it make the game play so Hard, so to make the game more Hard than the first one, i make the enemy spawner and i make the Player can shoot to the enemy.
